introduction: Find out how you can become a police officer, Police Community Support Officer, special constable or support volunteer.
more_information:
##Age limits

You must be aged at least 18 to apply to become a:

- police officer
- special constable
- Police Community Support Officer

If you're aged between 16 and 18 you can apply to become a police cadet - although not all police forces have them.
